SQL.LOAD: SELECT special_service_id, product_code_id, modified_date, modified_by, created_date, created_by, product_special_service_id FROM elp_product_special_service WHERE product_special_service_id = :product_special_service_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT psplsvc.special_service_id, psplsvc.product_code_id, psplsvc.created_by, psplsvc.created_date, psplsvc.modified_by, psplsvc.modified_date, pc.product_code Product_code, pc.description Product_description, psplsvc.product_special_service_id FROM elp_product_special_service psplsvc, elp_product_code pc WHERE psplsvc.product_code_id = pc.product_code_id AND psplsvc.special_service_id = :special_service_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_product_special_service SET special_service_id = :special_service_id, product_code_id = :product_code_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE product_special_service_id = :product_special_service_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_product_special_service ( special_service_id, product_code_id, created_by, product_special_service_id ) VALUES ( :special_service_id, :product_code_id, :created_by, :product_special_service_id )
SQL.LOAD_BY_PROD_CODE_SPL_SVC: SELECT psplsvc.special_service_id, psplsvc.product_code_id, psplsvc.created_by, psplsvc.created_date, psplsvc.modified_by, psplsvc.modified_date, pc.product_code Product_code, pc.description Product_description, psplsvc.product_special_service_id FROM elp_product_special_service psplsvc, elp_product_code pc WHERE psplsvc.product_code_id = pc.product_code_id AND psplsvc.special_service_id = :special_service_id and pc.product_code_id = :product_code_id
